meanings.sent1: The priest was sacring the bread and wine during the religious ceremony.

meanings.definition: The act of consecrating or making holy
meanings.sent1: The sacring of the relics was a solemn event in the church.
meanings.sent2: The villagers gathered to witness the sacring of the new church bell.
meanings.sent3: The children found joy in pretending to perform the sacring of their secret hideout.
meanings.sent4: The sacring of the old tree by the river symbolized renewal and growth.
meanings.sent5: The annual sacring of the harvest was a time of gratitude and celebration.
